answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Makinde,
We have topic pages that help to summarize the roles of various things in local government, including a GIS topic. If you visit the link below, you can browse Blog Posts, Questions, Documents, and more, all relating to GIS.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/113/GIS
I hope this helps to answer this question.
Thank you,
Max Moline
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA
